nodes.text: Station commander was a rank within the Galactic Empire that was used on board their Death Star superweapon. Station commanders were responsible for commanding one of the four station control centers, each of which oversaw the operations of one of the Death Star's hemispheres. Commanders Pamel Poul and Sheard both held the position in Station Control West. Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod served as the station commander aboard the DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station.
